data.author: A.J

changelog.release_notes: bug fixed - does not refresh at all.
fix background mismatch problem for Pebble Steel

- removed random watchface feature but still it changes watchface every time you shake your pebble.
- To fix watchface, 
   1) select your favorite watchface by shaking
   2) keep your pebble flipped (up side down) in 5 seconds
   3) if you feel vibration (800ms), then it is fixed until it removed from your pebble.

final release for Pebble Classic, Pebble Steel. 
also supports Pebble Time.
add inverted display on Slow watchface.

- built with SDK3.
- display custom branding title
- show 24h based watchface on normal mode
- show 12h based watchface on shaking (for 5 seconds)
- stop updating watchface after hibernate point. (default 5minutes)

1. can show digits along with hour-hand
2. turn on/off warning for bluetooth disconnection
3. can show date information by tapping
4. Bluetooth sniff interval control (useful when you need to be warned quickly if bluetooth disconnected. but battery rapidly drains if on)
can shrink overall watchface size
changed: Due to the low-resolutoin of Pebble, only some digits are enlarged.
changed: remove display battery info & date at launching
initial release, compiled with SDK v1.4.1

data.description:
Slow watch for pebble, inspired by slow-watches.com Permission granted by Slow Watch to use design & the name 'Slow'

From v3.5

* Removed random watchface feature but still it changes face every time you shake your pebble.

* If you want a fixed face, 
   1) select your favorite face by shaking your pebble.
   2) keep your pebble flipped (upside down) in 5 seconds
   3) if you feel a strong vibration, then it is fixed until it removed from your pebble.
   4) It will not use any sensors

latest_release.release_notes: bug fixed - does not refresh at all.

data.title: Slow
